From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

The biggest reason I would want a private group is choosing the 
scenarios for the tournament and making minimal modifications to them.

Yes, we all have our preferences, but I am afraid of resulting 
confusion about which scenarios to use for the tournament vs which 
scenarios have the best grids and are the easiest.  Incidently, I 
would rather not have anybody end up with an exp level 4 character 
after going through the tournament scenarios.  There are some definite 
ways of achieving that goal.

Beyond that, I would like to see the rules discussed in here.  Basic 
rules like what constites 'cheating' and how to score points and how 
to decide tie-breakers.
